PHRASE.LANG: Matsu may have been created in a factory, but that doesn't mean she doesn't have an appreciation for dance and music. Matsu is skilled in beautiful, graceful movements. [#Legal]
Matsu a peut-être été créée dans une usine, mais cela ne l’empêche pas d'apprécier la musique ni la danse. Matsu est réputée pour ses magnifiques mouvements pleins de grâce. [#Legal]
Matsu wurde zwar in einer Fabrik gefertigt, doch das heißt nicht, dass sie nichts für Tanz und Musik übrig hat. Matsu beherrscht die Kunst der eleganten Bewegungen perfekt. [#Legal]
Matsu è stata creata in una fabbrica, ma questo non significa che non conosca danza e musica. Matsu si muove con grande abilità e grazia. [#Legal]
Puede que Matsu fuera creada en una fábrica, pero eso no significa que no le guste el baile y la música. Matsu domina los movimientos gráciles y encantadores. [#Legal]
音楽と舞踊をこよなく愛する芸者ロボット‐松。松のしなやかで妖艶な踊りをご堪能下さい。 [#Legal]
마츠는 공장에서 만들어지기는 했지만, 그녀에게 춤과 음악에 대한 취향이 없는 건 아니랍니다. 마츠는 아름답고 우아한 동작을 펼쳐 보일 수 있으니까요. [#Legal]
Matsu may have been created in a factory, but that doesn't mean she doesn't have an appreciation for dance and music. Matsu is skilled in beautiful, graceful movements. [#Legal]
松子雖然是工廠大量製造，但是跳舞唱歌樣樣通。松子擅長優美高雅的動作。 [#Legal]
松子雖然是工廠大量製造，但是跳舞唱歌樣樣通。松子擅長優美高雅的動作。 [#Legal]
Matsu may have been created in a factory, but that doesn't mean she doesn't have an appreciation for dance and music. Matsu is skilled in beautiful, graceful movements. [#Legal]
